data.title: Joyalukkas Foundation
data.text:
About

Joyalukkas Foundation is the Corporate Social Responsibility division of the multi-billion global conglomerate The Joyalukkas Group.

Joyalukkas Foundation consistently undertakes various programs to help the needy and encourages causes that benefit society. From building homes to helping flood victims, blood donations or conducting health camps, the Group has always believed in being there when needed the most.
